Index.desc: Modern technology and design for creating a minecraft project
Index.item.one_desc: Intuitive interface that gets you up and running in minutes
Index.item.two_desc: Customize your website exactly how you want with powerful customization tools
Index.item.three_desc: Advanced security measures to protect your content and data

Settings.desc.unlinkdiscord: This will remove the connection between your account and Discord.

Admin.Settings.validation.password.numbers: Password cannot consist entirely of numbers.
Admin.Settings.validation.password.chars: Password must contain at least one non-numeric character.
